timeline.message:
Add EntityItemPickupEvent
(It should really be named ItemEntityPickupEvent but w/e)

timeline.author: TheGlitch76

replies.bodyText: StorageMinecartEntity doesn't seem to have dropContentsWhenDead - i assume it's a forge method
replies.author: williambl

replies.bodyText: It is, but it just accesses a field. Can you use an accessor mixin (following our naming conventions) and add a TODO? Seems like this could cause a hard to track bug.
replies.author: TheGlitch76

replies.bodyText: It's the same behaviour as forge now - what do you mean by adding a // TODO? What should it say?
replies.author: williambl

timeline.message: Add Forge behavioural change w.r.t teleporting `StorageMinecartEntity`s
